price: Kada ka mõtsar* da harshenka game da shi dõmin ka yi gaugãwar riƙe shi (Alƙur'ãni).
arabic: لَا تُحَرِّكۡ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعۡجَلَ بِهِۦٓ
footnotes: * Dangantakar wannan ãya da ta sama da ita, ita ce bambancin Annabi mai gaggawar karɓar umurnin Allah da ƙyamar kãfiri ga karɓarsa, da bayãnin sauƙaƙewar Allah ga mai bin umurninSa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā tuḥarrik bihi lisānaka litaʿjala bihi
